scheduleCardsData.heading: Schedule your health check
scheduleCardsData.description: Connect with a healthcare professional through a video call to dive into your medical history and design a persoalizes treatment plan.

scheduleCardsData.heading: Get your meds delivered
scheduleCardsData.description: Recieve your medication conveniently shipped to your door via our telehealth service.

scheduleCardsData.heading: Achieve lasting weight loss
scheduleCardsData.description: Regularly meet with a medical expert every 1-4 weeks to adjust your medications and ensure your weight loss journey stays on track.
